mail.title: [Knowledge] Add Comment {KnowledgeId} - {KnowledgeTitle}
mail.description:
When a comment is registered, System will give out a notice.
[Reserved keywords] If you write the following keywords in the body, replace the value when sending mail.
- {URL} : URL of Target data - {CommentInsertUser} : User name who comment saved - {CommentContents} : Contents of comment - {KnowledgeId} : ID - {KnowledgeTitle} : Title - {Contents} : Content of article
